header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: Have a question? We're here to help.

contactSection.title: Still have a question?
contactSection.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

q1.question: What is your return policy?
q1.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused products in their original packaging.

q2.question: How long does shipping take?
q2.answer: Shipping typically takes 3-5 business days for domestic orders and 7-14 days for international orders.

q3.question: Do you offer international shipping?
q3.answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. Shipping costs and times vary by destination.

q4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q4.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

q5.question: How can I track my order?
q5.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your order from your account dashboard.

q6.question: Do you have a physical store?
q6.answer: Yes, we have a flagship store in San Francisco. Check our store locator for address and hours.

q7.question: Can I change or cancel my order?
q7.answer: You can change or cancel your order within 1 hour of placing it. Contact customer service for assistance.

q8.question: What is your warranty policy?
q8.answer: All products come with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty. Extended warranties are available for purchase.

q9.question: How do I contact customer support?
q9.answer: You can contact us via email at support@example.com, phone at +1-234-567-8901, or live chat on our website.

q10.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
q10.answer: Yes, we offer volume discounts for orders over 50 units. Contact our sales team for a custom quote.

q11.question: Are your products eco-friendly?
q11.answer: Yes, we use sustainable materials and eco-friendly packaging for all our products.

q12.question: How do I create an account?
q12.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner and follow the simple registration process.

search.tryDifferentKeywords: Try different keywords or browse all questions below
